guiTeacher.components

Class SimpleTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiTeacher.components.Component
      • guiTeacher.components.StyledComponent
        • guiTeacher.components.SimpleTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Dragable, Visible

    public class SimpleTable
extends StyledComponent
implements Clickable, Dragable
    Serves as a basic table with scrolling, drag-to-move rows and editing values
    Author:
    bnockles

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleTable

        public SimpleTable(FocusController fc,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int h,
                   TableHeader columns)
        Parameters:
        fc - the FocusController (Screen) in which this table is positioned
        x - the x coordinate within the container
        y - the y coordinate within the container
        h - the height of this table (which is scrollable) (width is summed from columns widths)
        columns - a TableHeader object defining each column of the SimpleTable

      • SimpleTable

        public SimpleTable(FocusController fc,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int w,
                   int h,
                   TableHeader columns)
        Parameters:
        fc - the FocusController (Screen) in which this table is positioned
        x - the x coordinate within the container
        y - the y coordinate within the container
        w - the width of this table (columns will be clipped to this width)
        h - the height of this table (which is scrollable)
        columns - a TableHeader object defining each column of the SimpleTable

      • SimpleTable

        public SimpleTable(FocusController fc,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int w,
                   int h,
                   TableHeader columns,
                   boolean multiline)
        Parameters:
        fc - the FocusController (Screen) in which this table is positioned
        x - the x coordinate within the container
        y - the y coordinate within the container
        w - the width of this table (columns will be clipped to this width)
        h - the height of this table (which is scrollable)
        columns - a TableHeader object defining each column of the SimpleTable
        multiline - whether or not rows expand for multiple lines of text
